a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Starting salaries for teachers in public primary education vs. GDP
Gross annual salary expressed in international-$ at 2020/21 prices before tax for a fully qualified, entry-level teacher with minimum
training, based on official pay scales, and includes employer contributions to social security and pension.
Starting statutory teacher salaries in public primary
Data source: OECD via World Bank (2023)
Note: GDP per capita data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices.
